A

accelerate() - Method in class comets.Ship
Increases the speed of the ship by a slight amount in the direction that it is facing.

C

Comet - Class in comets
This class is the root of all comet objects.

comets - package comets
 

E

explode() - Method in class comets.Comet
This indicates to the comet that it has been shot and should break into pieces.
explode() - Method in class comets.LargeComet
Splits this comet into pieces.
explode() - Method in class comets.MediumComet
Splits this comet into pieces.
explode() - Method in class comets.SmallComet
Since this is the smallest category of comet, it should be completely destroyed if hit.

fire() - Method in class comets.Ship

In addition to moving the shot, the age of the shot should be incremented by one.
move() - Method in class comets.SpaceObject
Updates the position of the object based on its velocity, and wraps it around to the other side of the play field if it goes off the edge.
